property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may shieldify the top card of your deck. If you do, put the top card of your deck on that shield face up. (The stack is still considered one shield.) ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (2).) {BUZZRENDER}Draw a card. ■ When you put this creature, put a card in your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, the first creature you summon may cost 1 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)
